text:
Please note this is a template site. Feel free to use and change this as you want
Welcome to the “insert company” data science community site. We’re glad you’re here! This site will include recordings of past events, resources, and information for getting set-up with the tools available in the organization.
All are welcome - no matter your team or experience. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out on our Data Science Slack channel.

Please note this is a template site. Feel free to use and change this as you want
We’d love to see you at an upcoming community event!
We host the following events at XYZ Company:

Beginner Office Hours every Tuesday from 11-11:30 am ET
Internal Meetup to highlight use cases the first Wednesday of every month at 9 am ET
Data Science Conference - once a year

You can use the calendar below to add individual events to your calendar or subscribe in the right-hand corner to be notified of every event.






Tip for your own site





You can use AddEvent to create a free account for people to add each community event to their calendar. AddEvent provides the html code chunk needed to embed this calendar into your own site.

Company XYZ has Posit Team: Posit Workbench, Posit Connect, Posit Package Manager available across the organization. To request access, please contact: sales@posit.co (insert your own company contact)

Example community formats & talks:
Sometimes it can be helpful to borrow from other community organizers, rather than starting from scratch. Here are a few formats that have worked for others:






   
     
     
       Order By
       Default
         
          Title
        
         
          Date - Oldest
        
         
          Date - Newest
